extendedInfo.description: Need something new, funny and cute for Your phone? Bored of casual sms skins? We've got theme just right for You! On light blue background, there're white, cartoon-like clouds - the more You write the more appears. More to add, there are pretty suns and rainbows peeking out from behind them. Sun is the sign of happiness, warmness and stability. If some lost cloud would happen and make some rain, then sky is even prettier. Rainbow is made of sun and water from the clouds, and yet it's one of the most beautiful sights.When you are texting with other person your conversation will be decorated with cute clouds with rainbow on the top. Each top and bottom panel are transparent so wallpaper great fits to it. Requirements:This theme requires GO SMS Pro application installed on your phone. You can download it for free from Google Play typing GO SMS Pro in search field.This theme contains:-  as backgroud is a fantastic, blue, azure wallpaper with clouds- changed messages frames. They are white, in the shape of clouds with yellow sun and colorful rainbow. They are perfectly readable because they have black letters.- pop up window draws into the shape of cloud and has a big, colorful rainbowHow to run our theme:1. Download our GO SMS Pro Beautiful Clouds for free2. Open GO SMS Pro application and press MENU button.3. Choose our Beautiful Clouds Theme and click applyHow to change theme appearance:1. Open GO SMS Pro application and press Menu button.2. Choose Settings.3. From settings tab select Advanced tab.4. Press Appearance Settings5. Set any option of our theme. You can set there:- Conversation List appearance- Conversation appearance- Popup window appearance- Text Font- Reset to default settings.Support - âTHEMES ARCHITECTâ:If you need help with our theme please contact with us on email: themesarchitect@gmail.comOur support works only in the English language. Please contact us in this language because we will solve your problem easier.Comments and rating:If you want to help other users find our theme please leave comment and positive rating.Before posting negative opinion please contact us. We can solve your issue in most cases and you will be happy using our theme without problems.Advertising:This free application is ads supported. Ads may show in notification tray and / or your smartphone home screen. Permissions are for ads.Other themes from âTHEMES ARCHITECTâFull list of our themes is available by clicking our developer name on Google Play.Check our other Â GO Launcher EX, GO SMS Pro and GO Locker free themes. Themes are released regularly so you can find something new every time.Compatibility:Our themes has been tested on the most common smartphone-s offered by manufacturers such as: Samsung, HTC, LG, Sony and Motorola. Our themes works with Android 2.2 and later.
